archimate:BusinessFunction.name: LSA
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Context: LSA H160 program LSA aims at describing the supportability concept for the ILS in the downstream process: - Operational / Intermediate Maintenance Level (OLM/ILM) Operations for final customers on how to operate the H/C; - Identify all the parts from Design office that can be procurable to the customers (procurable / spare parts). These data are deliverables respectively for ILS that aims at delivering the Maintenance Tech Data (MTD) and for Part Tech Data (PTD) to produce IPC.
